p: The application of plant-based products to support the growth of aquatic organisms has become widely used [ 15, 26] ( Table 1). Dietary incorporation of yucca products has favorable effects on the growth performance, feed efficiency, and health of aquatic animals [ 42, 43]. The improvement in growth as a result of yucca supplements may be linked to the enhancement in water quality and feed utilization, which relies on the intestinal status via modulating the gut flora, enzyme activity, and absorption [ 33, 44, 45].
